title: I got banned for botting but I didnt bot?
body:
Im so sad... after 3 days spend leveling my account to 30 so I can finally have a nice main account again, I got perm banned for botting. While I did NOT!!

Can someone please help me with this, its a obvious mistake. You can see my match history where i spammed twisted treeline 3v3 games and finish it in 8 minutes. Anything else I can do to proof it i will... please riot help me.

replies.body:
You can appeal such punishment through player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Past that, there's not much we on OCE can offer you other than:

1. Check your account for signs of compromise.
2. If you bought the account it was probably botted (and both of those things will result in a perma).
